page.title: 08BUTLERS FARM (WOLVES).
page.content: MRS PALMER HAS TWO WOLVES CALLED QUATRO AND QUEENIE. THE FIRST WOLF THEY HAD WAS CALLED LADY.SOON THEY GOT A COMPANION FOR HER CALLED SUSIE.SUSIE DIED AND LADY LIVED WITH QUATRO AND QUEENIE BUT QUEENIE AND SHE FOUGHT OVER QUATRO.NOW ONLY QUATRO AND QUEENIE LIVE AT BUTLERS FARM. THE WOLVES HAVE STARRED IN DRACULA,THE TIME OF THE WOLVES,AMERICAN WEREWOLVES IN LONDON,THE COMPANY OF WOLVES AND T.V'S BOX OF DELIGHTS.THE WOLVES ARE A MIXTURE OF BROWN,BLACK AND TAN. THEY LIVE IN ONE BIG CAGE. ONCE A DAY THEY ARE FED TRIPE STRAIGHT FROM THE CARCASE. WHEN THEY HOWL THEY SOUND LIKE A DOZEN WOLVES. SAMANTHA CASTELL.
